example.eg: A trip to the art gallery always leaves me feeling inspired.
example.egtrans: 去画廊看看总能让我获得灵感。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 受到启发的，获得灵感的

example.eg: They certainly have an inspired approach to the problem.
example.egtrans: 他们解决问题的方式受灵感启发。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 来自灵感的, 受灵感启发的

example.eg: Fred tried to inspire his workers by offering stock options.
example.egtrans: 为激励雇员，弗莱德提供了股票奖励。

example.eg: My sister's success in business inspired me to set up my own company.
example.egtrans: 我妹妹下海成功，激发我也成立了自己的公司。

example.eg: Impressionism inspires me more than any other art movement.
example.egtrans: 印象主义其他任何艺术运动更能激发我的创意。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 引发…的灵感, 激发…的创意

example.eg: Kate uses music to inspire her artwork.
example.egtrans: 卡伦用音乐给自己的艺术作品以灵感。

example.eg: Jeff's work inspired a lot of confidence in his abilities among the management, and he was promoted soon.
example.egtrans: 杰夫的工作表现激起了管理层对他能力的信心，很快，杰夫就喜获升迁。

example.eg: The lungs inspire oxygen into the respiratory system.
The martyr maintained that God had inspired her actions.
